vclaim: He says Ronald Reagan said he felt like "the one who shakes the President's hand" when he met Donald Trump.
date: stated on February 4, 2019 in a Facebook post:
title: No, Ronald Reagan didn't say meet Trump. I felt like a handshake with the president.
text: Did President Ronald Reagan feel that he met a successor to the presidency after shaking the hands of young Donald Trump? No, but the photo of the two men who appeared on Facebook in February 4 suggested the same thing. "For the sake of my life, I will never know how to explain it, when I met that young man, I felt that I was the one shaking the hands of the president," called Reagan an article about the Trump meeting.
